channel.title: Yes on Poco A Poco | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado
channel.description: Recent content in Yes on Poco A Poco | Digital Design and Video Production in Denver, Colorado

item.title: Kickstarter Videos for Artana Games
item.description: Powering Up! is an expansion to the hit board game Tesla vs. Edison. Funded over 3000%, Powering Up! raised 3/4ths the money of its base game, Tesla vs. Edison.

item.title: Case Study Video for Involution Studios
item.description: DataXu had a unique vision to be a leader in the big data game. Thanks to the Involution Studios redesign that data now gives their clients many recommendations and methods to forecast, in real time, anytime.

item.title: Website for The Xavier Lab
item.description: The Xavier Lab at Massachusetts General Hospital and the Broad Institute needed to refresh their web presence. They had the content, their problem was its presentation. Their website was information rich, but ugly and difficult to keep updated.

item.title: Website for the GodTech Project
item.description: The GodTech project endeavours to research, consider, and popularize the ways that bioscience and digital technology may practically impact us.
